_comment: Days to wait before removing a movie or serie
Time in hours to wait before a new scan if start_all_day is false this will be ignored
Time in hours to wait before starting the first scan if start_all_day is false this will be ignored
Date to start scan all day (format: HH:MM) or if you want specific days use start_in and waiting_time and set this to false
True if you want delete only movies with a 4k version
True if you want delete only series with a 4k version
Discord webhook url for info None if you don't want to use it
Discord webhook url for errors None if you don't want to use it
If radarr url not contains this string, the movie will not be deleted, false if you don't want to use it
If sonarr url not contains this string, the serie will not be deleted, false if you don't want to use it
